website_summaries.verdict: Microsoft's Surface Laptop with Windows 10 S is aimed at students looking for a sleek alternative to the aging Apple MacBook Air. It's stylish and powerful, but you'll want to nab the free Windows 10 Pro upgrade while you can.
cons: Installed OS is locked to Windows Store apps
Windows 10 Pro is a paid upgrade after promotional period

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have moved from MacAir to Surface. So far very happy with the move. A robust high spec laptop. Very happy with Windows 10 as well. Reason for moving was Apple's lack of development of MacAirs after so long and their breathtaking prices. Microsoft Surface is a dream to use and the touchscreen is great. Two downsides - you cant migrate Outlook for Mac back to PC (!!). The alcantara keyboard material feels nice. Not sure how durable this is or how hygienic - developers should have thought a bit more here. But def gets 5*. Update - October - I've regrettably gone back to MacAir. Despite 4GM of RAM the laptop was painfully slow and tech support fairly basic.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa K

customer_reviews.title: AMERICAN VERSION
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't say in the write up but this is an American laptop, it comes with both leads for UK and USA plugs but the keyboard is slightly different to the UK version, no £ sign on the keyboard unless you change the context to a UK keyboard, which then causes the problem that the @ isn't on the key that it is shown on and you lose # as that becomes the £ sign, my daughter originally wanted to return it but to buy it in UK version costs £400 more, she says she will live with it but it is not quite the bargain that it first appears to be from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: crozi66

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: I honestly bought this laptop with so many doubts on its credibility and durability. But it turned out to be a beautiful piece of technology, I've only had it for a day so I cannot speak about its long-term performance, but so far so good. I bought this as an emergency laptop because mine broke, so wanted a high-end, speedy laptop with a great keyboard and this laptop fits that description. So if you are thinking of buying this laptop it is soooo worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maaria

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop to use. Very poor connectivity, only one USB port. Windows 10 S is very restrictive, but very easy to upgrade to full Windows 10, just by entering a product key.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of very little use (sending/receiving emails) the laptop will no long turn on. Stuck in a boot loop. The seller told me to take it to a Microsoft store and amazon refused to step in and help.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Super smart looking. Nicer than my MacBook Air. Batter lasts around 6-8 hours max for me.

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as my Apple Macbook
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Every bit as good as my Apple Macbook. Looks great in blue.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and good performance
customer_reviews.text: Build quality, sound, speed, battery - everything is very good on this computer. I feel this will last many years - not a throw away item - any issues I will send it for repair; I want to keep it - not bin it like I have done with previous laptops. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft surface laptop
customer_reviews.text: The laptop looks great and easy to use but, after only having the laptop for one day the facial recognition said it didnt recognise me and required me to enter my pin, but there was no where for me to do that and said i would need to go to settings and change my pin, I obviously couldn't do this as I couldn't get into the laptop! If I didnt know someone that could fix it for me then I would have returned this, apart from that problem I'm happy with it so far and hopefully it's okay now! Fast delivery and great price though.
customer_reviews.author: heidi meadlarklan

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Got it for £630 but i know it’s now in offer at £500 🙄 very great, ideal for business people or university students (i’m a uni student) has laptop and tablet mode which is great. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: SSD crashing after 30mins use
customer_reviews.text: SSD drive crashed 30mins after use Continued to do so after resetting Apparently it as a failing SSD drive straight out the box Amazon is sending out a replacement let's see if this is any better hope it's not a faulty batch will review laptop number 2 a couple days after it arrives

customer_reviews.title: Great value

customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Better hope yours doesn't come with S Mode
customer_reviews.text: Great hardware but Microsoft ruin the experience of receiving them (I've bought quite a lot for the business) by installing "S Mode" at random on some devices, which you then have to go through a painful process to get rid of - this can take anywhere from 15 mins to my most recent experience which took up 2 hours of my time, a lot of which was spent on the phone to support, because they couldn't work out how to get rid of this pointless 'mode' on their own equipment. Google "Microsoft S Mode" for all the horror stories on what this mode does. Classic, terrible Microsoft nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Pomfret

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended -Microsoft total control freeks!
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing and initially good functionality until Microsoft's forced incessant auto updates causes it to crash and NONE of the integrated recovery options work!! No external classic buttons to push to perform manual reboot so the laptop becomes totally useless because you just can't by pass these auto options to fix it manually and is totally inoperable unless you're a tech geek! None of the cmd prompts suggested online work and the designated Microsoft site to help you 'cannot be found'!! Take note.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: power supply very fragile
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third power supply - with one something broke in the wire. With the other I dropped the box off the arm of a chair & it broke just like that.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I have ever had. No cd part is becoming part of modern laptops so just bought a USB plug in one for when needed (not often). Battery life is unreal, very impressive & the touch screen feature is uncannily useful.

customer_reviews.title: Its a laptop not a tablet+

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets

Every thing about this laptop is perfectly designed and it has gotten quite a few compliments from my friends.
